Name: Inazuman Home: The Work of Generations
Desc: A home that can often be found in Inazuma. The two-story design provides ample space for use, whether one intends to use it as a dwelling or as a store. Inazuma City has a great many family businesses, and with such places, the family tends to live on the second floor while the first is reserved for the store, with multiple generations living and working in these houses for hundreds of years.
